Package com.esri.mo2.ui.toc

Contains all of the classes for creating a Table of Contents (TOC).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DataFrame Conceptually A DataFrame is a collection of map layers and presents a geographical area.
DataFrameListener Defines an interface for an object that listens to the DataFrame change in the Toc, such that a DataFrame is inserted or removed from the Toc.
SymbolLeafNode A SymbolLeafNode defines a leaf node for the Toc and describes a group of features by symbol.
TreeTocListener Defines an interface for an object that listens to the mouse click event on the Toc.
 

Class Summary
DataFrameEvent A DataFrameEvent will be fired when a DataFrame is inserted or removed in a Toc.
DataFrameNode A DataFrameNode presents a certain of geographic region under a projection with a group of layers in the Map.
FeatureLegendNode A FeatureLegendNode represents a FeatureLayer within the Toc.
GroupLegendNode A GroupLegendNode represents a group layer which usually is an image service of ArcIMS server.
ImageLegendNode An ImageLegendNode represents an image layer in the Toc.
LegendNode A LegendNode is a non-leaf TreeNode in a Toc.
TreeToc A Toc is a table of contents(TOC) for a Map with a tree-style organization.
TreeTocAdapter A simple adapter class for TreeTocListener
TreeTocBeanInfo A BeanInfo class associated with the TocTree bean.
TreeTocCellEditor A customized TreeCellEditor class is used to edit the name of node in the Toc
TreeTocCellRenderer A TocTreeCellRenderer is responsible for renderering all nodes in the TocTree.
TreeTocDragDropImpls TocTreeDrapDropImpls is an abstract class, it implements the Java drag & drop API to allow a LegendNode change its position by Drag & Drop.
TreeTocEvent A TocTreeEvent is to be sent to TocTreeListener.
TreeTocModel The only customized place the class is different from the DefaultTreeModel is the reload() method.
TreeTocPopup TocPopup is a popup window associated with a LegendNode.
TreeTocPopupActions TocPopupActions is a collection of default actions for TocPopup menu.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.ui.toc Description

Contains all of the classes for creating a Table of Contents (TOC). The TOC UI organizes the contents of a map in a tree-style way.
